projects.title: Open Sales Order & Pipeline Analytics
projects.problem: Limited visibility into open sales orders obscures true pipeline health.
projects.solution: Delivers a real-time, consolidated view of open orders with trend insights.
projects.impact: Enables clearer pipeline tracking and faster, data-driven sales decisions.
projects.details:
This Open Sales Order analytics solution provides a real-time, consolidated view of open sales performance across customers, regions, and sales ownership. It enables clear visibility into order value, volume, pricing, and status, while supporting year-over-year trend analysis to identify demand patterns and seasonality.

The solution demonstrates strong capability in business-aligned KPI definition, dynamic, filter-driven analysis, and insight-focused reporting, supporting faster and more informed decision-making for sales and leadership teams.

projects.title: Performance Leaderboard
projects.problem: Relying on intuition to assess performance caused leaders to overlook top talent.
projects.solution: Automated rankings and trend insights to recognize high performers instantly.
projects.impact: Data-driven performance reviews without manual reporting.
projects.details:
This dashboard delivers a holistic view of sales performance and revenue trends across time, regions, products, and ownership. It enables stakeholders to track sales growth, contribution patterns, and performance drivers through interactive comparisons and drill-down analysis.

The solution highlights the ability to structure complex sales data into meaningful KPIs, enable multi-dimensional analysis, and present insights in a way that supports strategic planning, performance monitoring, and informed business decisions.

projects.title: Time-Intelligent Sales Benchmarking
projects.problem: Current-month performance lacks historical context for meaningful evaluation.
projects.solution: Compares current sales, profit, and volume against rolling historical averages.
projects.impact: Enables clearer trend detection and more confident performance decisions.
projects.details:
This dashboard enables comparative performance analysis by evaluating current month sales, profit, and volume against rolling 3-, 6-, 12-, and 24-month averages. This approach helps identify short-term momentum, long-term trends, and performance deviations with clarity.

The solution demonstrates the ability to deliver time-intelligent analytics, support trend benchmarking, and provide context-driven insights that improve sales monitoring, forecasting accuracy, and data-driven decision-making.

projects.title: Period-Based Sales Performance Comparison
projects.problem: Sales performance is difficult to interpret without clear comparison across time periods.
projects.solution: Displays previous, current, and next period sales metrics dynamically based on the selected period.
projects.impact: Enables quick period-over-period analysis and better short-term planning decisions.
projects.details:
This dashboard provides a dynamic, period-driven sales comparison view by displaying previous, current, and next period values across all key sales metrics based on a user-selected timeframe. It allows users to seamlessly evaluate performance shifts, identify momentum changes, and anticipate near-term outcomes.

The solution demonstrates strong use of time intelligence and dynamic calculations, enabling consistent period-over-period analysis that improves sales monitoring, planning accuracy, and data-driven decision-making.

projects.title: Flat File Comparison Tool
projects.problem: Manual validation of large Excel and CSV files is time-consuming and error-prone.
projects.solution: A browser-based Python Streamlit application for reliable Source vs Target flat-file comparison.
projects.impact: Enables fast, accurate validation of 100k+ row datasets with audit-ready Excel outputs.
projects.details:
The Flat File Comparison Tool is a web-hosted data comparison application built using Python and Streamlit, designed to compare large Excel and CSV files directly from the browser without any local installation, setup, or technical configuration. It is optimized for business users, data analysts, auditors, and engineers who require reliable file-level and data-level comparison with clear diagnostics and structured outputs.

The tool supports Excel (.xlsx, .xls) and CSV (.csv) files and allows users to upload Source and Target files, dynamically select sheets, configure header row positions, and choose single or multiple business key columns. It includes advanced normalization features such as case-insensitive column matching, case-insensitive data comparison, optional whitespace trimming, and automatic handling of dates, numeric formats, and null values.

Comparison results include match percentage calculation, row-level classification (present in both files, missing in target, newly added in target), schema difference detection, and value-level mismatch identification. Intelligent diagnostics provide root-cause analysis, ranked mismatch impact, sample value inspection, and automated recommendations to improve match accuracy.

After execution, the tool generates a downloadable, business-friendly Excel report containing an Executive Summary, Column Names comparison, Row Comparison, Unique Values analysis, and Summary Statistics. All files are processed securely in-memory per session, with no permanent storage or external system integration, ensuring data privacy and session-level isolation.
